bluej.codecoverage.pref

Class AbstractPreferenceStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • bluej.codecoverage.pref.AbstractPreferenceStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreferenceStore

    public abstract class AbstractPreferenceStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements PreferenceStore
    Abstract preference store that provides default implementations for some of the methods in PreferenceStore.
    Author:
    Ian

        public java.lang.String getPreference(java.lang.String key)
        Looks up a preference using the provided key.

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • getPreference

        public abstract java.lang.String getPreference(java.lang.String key,
                             java.lang.String def)
        Looks up a preference using the provided key.

        If value is found the key, then def is returned instead.

        Specified by:
        getPreference in interface PreferenceStore
        Parameters:
        key - key of the value to look up.
        def - default value to use if no value is found for the key.
        Returns:
        String value identified by the key.

      • setPreference

        public abstract void setPreference(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.String value)
        Sets the preference identified by the specified key to the specified value.

        This overwrites any existing preference stored using the same key.

        Specified by:
        setPreference in interface PreferenceStore
        Parameters:
        key - key to identify the preference
        value - value of the preference to save

      • getLocation

        public java.lang.String getLocation()
        Location where the preference is stored.

        This is expected to be an absolute path to the directory under which the preferences are stored.

        Specified by:
        getLocation in interface PreferenceStore
        Returns:
        absolute path to the director of the preferences.
